nodes.text: The Baldavia system was located in the Interior Region, an area of the Hapes Cluster in the Slice portion of the Inner Rim. It was connected via hyperlanes to the Gallinore and Theselon systems. The Baldavia system was home to the creature known as the Baldavian pocket hare and was the origin point of the group known as Baldavian lip-readers.
The Baldavia system was introduced in The Essential Atlas, a 2009 reference book authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square O-9.
